r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.5M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Voyageur Aviation. The average
  contract duration was 0.32 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $515.7K. The longest
  contract was 2.73 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $3.8M.
lookup_name: 'VOYAGEUR AVIATION'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.5M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '9'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '11%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '71%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '28.9K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.32'
s421_mean_contract_value: '515.7K'
s425_max_duration: '2.73'
s422_max_contract_value: '3.8M'
---
